== SouthAfricanTeam ==

The South African Team began forming just before LinuxWorld South Africa 2005. If you want to be involved please join our mailing list http://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-za and visit the SouthAfricanTeam wiki at http://www.ubuntu-za.org/Wiki .
